data.description: All of tools for opensource Asterisk PBX
data.communities: we can discuss asterisk&perl on irc.freenode.org/#perlchina
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
Asterisk is the 1st softPBX in opensource world like apache.

    and perl is best tool for asterisk config,manage and more features.

    same asterisk software written by perl like AMP. but we don't have
    namespace in cpan.

    we know voip(voice over ip) is next-generation telephony in future,
    we need asterisk namespace.

    my frist module help user write asterisk config file and asterisk
    call extension config file by they web interface or other
    interfaces.
